content.rendered:
STEDI BA15S Bayonet LED Light Conversion Globe in Single Filament which has a full brightness function only which is used in parkers, rear / reverse lights & interior lighting

COMING SOON

Coming Soon.

COMING SOON

Coming Soon.

COMING SOON

Coming Soon.

DETAILS

Our BAY15S LED are commonly used as reversing lamps and Parkers. If you’re tired of constantly changing out blown LED bulbs, then our LED upgrade is your answer.

Our reputation for quality LED precedes us, and our LED bulb replacements are no different. We guarantee our bulbs for 2 years against failures of any kind.

KEY TECHNICAL FEATURES | BA15S

  • CANBUS friendly – Error free operation on 98% of vehicles.
  • Not Polarity Sensitive – our BA15S wont fail if you plug them in the wrong way.
  • Constant Current circuit – Avoids compromising LED life & provides consistent illumination across all LEDs
  • Compatible from 9v to 30v circuits.
  • 20 SMD LED for uniform light distribution

BAY15S is also referred to as and replaces 1156 S25 P21W P21W 7507

Sold in packs of 2

SPECIFICATIONS

HOUSING MATERIAL Aluminium
LED 3030
POWER 0.2a @ 13.6v
COMPATIBLE VOLTAGE DC 12v and 24v
LIFESPAN 30,000 Hours
CANBUS Compatible
CONNECTOR TYPE BA15S
INGRESS PROTECTION IP65
OPERATING TEMP -40°c to + 80°c
CERTIFICATION CE, ROHS

 

 

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 2 x BAY15S 1156 S25 P21W P21W 7507

excerpt.rendered: Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
